t: Bon Jovi LP - Bon Jovi Official Store
s: Bon Jovi is the self-titled debut studio album by Bon Jovi, released on January 21, 1984. The songs may be simple and the writing prone to all cliches of the form, but the album boasts a pretty consistent hard rock attack, passionate playing, and a keen sense of melody.
